title: Gulanova Website
desc: A modern personal website for Gulanova, featuring responsive design and interactive elements.

title: Portfolio Website
desc: A sleek portfolio site to showcase projects, skills, and contact information.

title: Simple Todo
desc: A lightweight desktop application for managing daily tasks with a simple interface.

title: Wave Walker
desc: A Unity-based adventure game where players navigate challenging wave-filled environments.

title: Wave Walker 2
desc: The sequel to Wave Walker, introducing new levels, mechanics, and enhanced graphics.

title: Wave Walker 3: The Box
desc: The third installment in the Wave Walker series, featuring unique puzzles and box-based gameplay.

title: Dodge the Thing
desc: A fast-paced Unity game where players must dodge obstacles and survive as long as possible.

title: Zombie Shooter
desc: A Unity-based shooting game where players fight off waves of zombies using various weapons.

title: Gothicvania
desc: A 2D platformer inspired by gothic and metroidvania genres, built with Unity.

title: Apolz Pomodoro
desc: A productivity timer app based on the Pomodoro Technique, developed in Unity.
